page.title: 17HOUSING.
page.content: MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE SITUATED IN THE WEST OF THE BLOCK IN THE VILLAGES OF FISHBURN AND TRIMDON.THE REST OF THE BLOCK IS DOTTED WITH FARMHOUSES AND COTTAGES SURROUNDED BY FARMLAND.IN FISHBURNTHE OLDEST PRIVATE HOUSING HAS BEEN BUILT AROUND THE VILLAGE GREEN.THIS WAS MAINLY FARMHOUSES AND SHOPS.WITH THE OPENING OF THE COLLIERY,HOUSES WERE BUILT FOR THE WORKERS.THESE ARE MAINLY BUILT ALONG THE TWO ROADS THAT CROSS IN THE VILLAGE.THE REST OF THE HOUSES ARE COUNCIL OWNED AND BUILT BETWEEN THE TWO WORLD WARS.THESE HOUSES MAKE UP MOST OF THE VILLAGE.ONLY PART OF TRIMDON IS IN THIS BLOCK.THE HOUSES HERE ARE ALL COUNCIL BUILT IN THE SAME STYLE AND SAME AGE AS THE COUNCIL HOUSES IN FISHBURN.THE LOCAL COUNCIL IS NOW ALLOWING TENANTS TO BUY THESE HOUSES IF THEY WANT TO.
